name: sakura
normalized: uehh～, i'm still sticky all over.
asagi and the others made sure of the majuu's death, then wiped off the spurts of blood they had been showered with.
they had wiped pretty much all of it off, but, as sakura said, the disgusting feeling of it clinging to their entire bodies still remained.

name: asagi
normalized: …incidentally, sakura, why did you come here?
murasaki, too.
asagi folded her arms, and stared fixedly at the pair.

name: murasaki
normalized: i'm sorry.
th, that's…

name: sakura
normalized: teheheh, as her little sister, i have to diligently watch over onee-chan so she doesn't do slutty things♪

name: murasaki
normalized: a, asagi-sama's… s, s-sl, s・lut・ty?!

name: asagi
normalized: sakura!
even though she was being yelled at by asagi, sakura smiled and plugged her ears.

name: murasaki
normalized: sakura!
as if asagi-sama would do anything slutty!
don't talk nonsense!
for some reason, instead of asagi, murasaki approached sakura and raised her voice in anger.

name: sakura
normalized: why is murasaki getting angry?

name: murasaki
normalized: eh?!
w, well, that's… it's because you called your own elder sister a s… slut…

name: murasaki
normalized: it's because you said a ridiculous thing like that in the first place that i got stuck coming with you.

name: sakura
normalized: but, you started breathing roughly through your nose.
you were eager to help onee-chan, weren't you, mucchan?
sakura pointed a finger at murasaki, who was grumbling, and spoke about that time haughtily.

name: murasaki
normalized: uh…!
th, that was…!

name: asagi
normalized: yes, yes, that's enough, you two.
with a sigh, asagi put a stop to the pair's bickering, which seemed like it would go on and on.

name: asagi
normalized: just having you worry about me is enough.
so, make sure not to do something like this from now on.

name: murasaki
normalized: yes, asagi-sama!

name: sakura
normalized: hehen, i'll try♪
while visually comparing murasaki, who replied honestly, with her sister, who didn't look like she understood at all, asagi made a call to their headquarters.
after she had gotten authorization to return immediately, asagi breathed a small sigh, and cast her eyes toward sakura and murasaki once again.

name: asagi
normalized: at any rate, you've both improved.

name: sakura
normalized: eheheeh♪
i guess so, onee-chan!
so, if i don't do tomorrow's training──

name: asagi
normalized: sakura has to train diligently tomorrow too, so that she won't be off guard at any time.

name: sakura
normalized: uheeh… onee-chan, you oni…
sakura lowered her shoulders dejectedly due to her smiling sister's words, which had interrupted her halfway through.
asagi smiled at sakura once again, and this time turned her gaze towards murasaki.

name: asagi
normalized: murasaki has good intuition.
swordsmanship, too.
you don't hesitate.
you're training well.

name: murasaki
normalized: n, no, that's…!
just from being smiled at and spoken to by asagi, murasaki's face became so red that it seemed like flame was going to come out.

name: sakura
normalized: heeyy～, mucchan gets shy about being praised easily when she's in front of onee-chan.

name: murasaki
normalized: sakura!
y, you've been annoying me for a while!
murasaki's fist flew toward sakura's face.

name: sakura
normalized: hehen!
a strike like that──hh?!

name: sakura
normalized: bubeh…?!

name: murasaki
normalized: wha?!
even murasaki raised her voice in astonishment at the fact that her fist, which she had struck with the assumption that it would be avoided, had hit her directly.

name: murasaki
normalized: you idiot, why didn't you avoid it like always?!

name: sakura
normalized: owowow… weird, i couldn't go into a shadow!
sakura made a wry smile as she stood up, scratching her head.

name: sakura
normalized: eii!
yaah!
gunununununuu!

name: sakura
normalized: hh… haahaahaah, i knew it… i've become unable to use my shadow escape technique, onee-chan!

name: asagi
normalized: eh?!
sakura was desperately holding her breath and putting strength into her body, but her art wouldn't activate at all.
giving up, sakura gave her sister a look like she was depending on her.

name: murasaki
normalized: how?
you were using it until just before.

name: asagi
normalized: no way…?!
due to murasaki's words, “until just before”, asagi had recalled an out-of-place feeling in her body.
indeed, an incongruous feeling that she seemed to have overlooked, which she had felt after the battle, but not at all during it.
a small abnormality in her body.
something had permeated the core of her body through her skin, and impaired a part of her bodily functions.
a feeling like that.
a feeling that had hitherto been impossible.

name: asagi
normalized: fuh!
asagi let out a small breath, then calmed her mind and focused her spiritual energy.
however…

name: asagi
normalized: kuh…?!
she didn't feel the energy building up.
she didn't feel a rise in strength.
normally, it would be almost as easy as breathing, yet she couldn't control it at all.
no, before that――
her shinobi powers, which were said to be part of her genes――she was now unable to sense them at all.

name: asagi
normalized: me too, i've become unable to use my powers.
what about murasaki?

name: sakura
normalized: onee-chan too?!

name: murasaki
normalized: me too, asagi-sama… the power won't fill me at all…

name: asagi
normalized: …we've been affected.
having roughly guessed the cause, asagi looked at the ashes, which were scattered around the floor of the rooftop, and grimaced.
an even higher building than the one that asagi and the others were on.
from that rooftop, somebody had been watching their activity.
of course, asagi and the others had no way to realize this.
